name: Sleep
description: You attempt to touch a standard or lower creature and put them to sleep if they fail a resilience or endurance check of 5. A creature who falls asleep in this way can wake up after 1 hour or if they are disturbed by loud noises or taking damage.
charge: A willing creature who does not elect to get up after 1 hour and completes a full rest gets credit for a favorable rest, regardless of conditions, pain or stress.
